alert.note: Alert for Middle North Platte River Basin, Niobrara and Converse High Plains; Niobrara, Lower Elevations of Converse, Thunder Basin National Grassland (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued October 31 at 2:37AM MDT until November 01 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH FOR PARTS OF EAST-CENTRAL WYOMING AND THE NORTHERN NEBRASKA PANHANDLE TUESDAY AFTERNOON... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT TUESDAY AFTERNOON FOR FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 417, 418, AND 434... The National Weather Service in Cheyenne has issued a Fire Weather Watch, which is in effect Tuesday afternoon. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire weather zone 434 in the northern Nebraska Panhandle and fire weather zones 417 and 418 in east-central Wyoming. * WIND...Southwest 15 to 20 mph with gusts around 30 mph. * HUMIDITY...Around 15 percent * HAINES...4 to 5 * IMPACTS...any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Middle North Platte River Basin, Niobrara and Converse High Plains; Niobrara, Lower Elevations of Converse, Thunder Basin National Grassland
